message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to be flexible, $950000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle at $1050000? This would still be a great deal for you, considering the value you place on the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for your patience. I am willing to consider $1000000 as a counteroffer. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement.
